p: RNA was extracted from human placental explants by first homogenising the explants in 1 ml TRIzol Reagent (Invitrogen) in Lysing Matrix D tubes (MP Biomedicals) using the TeSeE ™ Precess 24 bead beater for 2x23 s at 6500 RPM. Supernatant (350 μl) was used for RNA isolation using the Direct-zol RNA miniprep kit (Zymo Research) according the manufacturer’s protocol.
